channel.title: I need serious help o.O(with mopar that is)
channel.description:
Ok, a couple things i need to know.
1. How do i go to someone elses server? I have read the guide to mopar, and i know what to do, but it says the server is down, when the server is online o.O
2. How do i get ancient magicks? plus, how do i cast without runes?
3. It always has problems with the connection in hybridscape. I cant stay logged in for more then 10 minutes, sometimes, it does it immediatly. How can this stop?
4. Also, how do you spawn monsters(like the kalphite queen) where you are?
Please help! Also, there are glitches in hybridscape, like when you equip gloves, they just go in the weapons slot.... and when i equip the fury amulet, it auto logs me out =\ and veracs flail is weilded wrong.

item.title: I need serious help o.O(with mopar that is)
item.dc:creator: @Typh Typh
item.source: I need serious help o.O(with mopar that is)

item.title: I need serious help o.O(with mopar that is)
item.dc:creator: @P3NGU1N1 P3NGU1N!!!
item.description:
@P3NGU1N1 wrote:

  1. Sometimes servers are down, resetting, or crashed. Or simply offline. Try other servers.
  2. Many different servers have spells that do not need runes.
  3. HybridScape is messed up. Just don’t play it.
  4. If you are an admin or owner you can type ::npc ID
    EX. ::npc 1552------spawns you a Santa

Read full topic
item.source: I need serious help o.O(with mopar that is)
